name: solana-playground
description: Solana Playground - Monorepo containing API and Web applications

scripts.dev:api: pnpm run env:dev && pnpm --filter api run start:dev
scripts.build: pnpm run build:api && pnpm run build:web
scripts.start:api: pnpm run env:prod && pnpm --filter api run start:prod
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:api && pnpm run lint:web
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run lint:api && pnpm run lint:web
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:api && pnpm run clean:web
scripts.clean:api: pnpm --filter api exec rimraf dist && pnpm --filter api exec rimraf node_modules
scripts.clean:web: pnpm --filter web exec rimraf .next && pnpm --filter web exec rimraf node_modules
scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/.next pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.setup: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm install && pnpm run symlink:verify
